text:
I think my personal project for my futur job has not link with a person especially but with my childhood. In fact the sunday afternoon, I liked to watch TV.  My parents showed me documentaries created by National Geographic and I really like the way that journalists show us a different way to represent animals, forest and nature. Colors, sounds and zooms are used to believe that the scene takes place in your house, in front of you. Everything is so real ! Even if you know the risk of be into the wild you want to live this kind of moments.
It's my opinion and maybe other people don't think like me, but that's why I want to become a reporter. To share my experiences to people who have not the chance to travel. The wild inspred me and showed me where is my place but today I have many others projects like help population in difficulty for example in Africa. They really need human work because they have not enough money to build school or buildings capable to welcomed war refugies . Side of this help I will also take interviews and videos of their way of living. They deserve more visibility and european population sometimes don't realize the chance we have to live in these countries. Socials medias are a good way to share these informations because today there is mostly use by people.
All these experiences let me think that my futur is to travel around the world, meet new people and share what I discover.
